head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials COHEN, HARRIS DAVID

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials COHEN, HARRIS DAVID

block.p: COHEN--Harris David. January 25, 1967 -August13,1985. You are always the first grandson & the first nephew. Love Unkie, Amy and Gaby

$(6$)COHEN--Harris David, January 25, 1967-August 13, 1985. Always in our thoughts, especially today on your 40th birthday. Our memories are beautiful; our hearts are broken. Much love, Mom, Dad, Jonathan, Lisa, Jake and Benjamin.
COHEN--Harris David. January 25, 1967 -August13,1985. You are always the first grandson & the first nephew. Love Unkie, Amy and Gaby
